text: haey yea k kau b ban pol tha ao kaun teanglay robsakhnhom. chaur puok anak kom chaul tam tvear temuoy te puok anak trauv chaul tam chrak tvear phe sa ng knea haey yeung min ach chuoy aoy puok anak ruochphot pi karkamnt robsa a l laoh ban laey saumbite b ndi ch kadaoy . kmean te kar kamnt noh leuklengte chea kammosetthi robsa a l laoh temuoyokt . champoh trong del khnhom ban brakl kar touk chetd . haey banda anak del touk chetd trauvte brakl kar touk chetd champoh trong
